projects.name: INFRAPEDIA
descriptions: Designed and developed mobile oriented designs for a more concise and easy-to-use UI, allowing the user to have a better experience.
This included thinking more about atomic design, allowing to reuse components across the entire UI, reducing considerably build time and also final bundle size.

projects.name: AGRIMANAGER
descriptions: Agrimanager project involving complex state management and seamless user experience.
Implemented with various front-end technologies to ensure scalability and maintainability.

projects.name: KOMERCIA
descriptions: Freelance project aimed at developing a robust e-commerce platform.
Focused on performance optimization and user-centric design.

projects.name: SERACERA
descriptions: Developed a WordPress-based e-commerce site for Seracera.
Enhanced user experience with intuitive navigation and responsive design.

projects.name: AGRIMANAGER V2.0
descriptions: Second version of Agrimanager with advanced state management and microfrontend architecture.
Focused on modularity and improved performance for large-scale applications.
